title: Software Developer
description:
Capgemini is a global business and technology transformation partner, helping organizations accelerate their dual transformation to address the evolving needs of customers and citizens. With a strong 55\\-year heritage and deep industry expertise, Capgemini is trusted by its clients to address the entire breadth of their business needs‚Äîfrom strategy and design to operations.
   

  

 To achieve this, Capgemini draws on the capabilities of its 360,000 team members in more than 50 countries, all driven by the purpose of unleashing human energy through technology for an inclusive and sustainable future. It is a responsible and diverse organization with market\\-leading capabilities in digital, cloud, and data.
   

  

**Job Description**
**Subject Matter Expert (SME) ‚Äì Oven Software Development**
**Location:** 
 Coimbatore, Bangalore
   

  

**Experience:** 
 9‚Äì15 years
   

  

**Role Mission**
 As a Subject Matter Expert (SME) in Oven Software Development, you will act as the technical authority for embedded solutions, hardware\\-software integration, and compliance with industry standards. Your mission is to define architectures, validate solutions, and transfer specialized knowledge to the development team, ensuring innovation and quality in oven control systems.
   

  

**Your Role**
 In this role, you will:
   

  

* Define software and hardware requirements for oven control systems (traditional, microwave, steam).
* Provide technical consultancy on embedded architectures, communication protocols, and integration with power electronics.
* Validate proposed solutions through code reviews, bench testing, and debugging activities.
* Ensure compliance with safety, EMC, and certification standards (CE, UL, etc.).
* Share expertise and best practices to foster technical growth within the team.
* Collaborate with Technical Leaders and Project Managers to achieve project milestones.
* Monitor technology trends and propose innovations for oven products.


**Your Profile**
* Proven experience in embedded software development for ovens or similar appliances.
* Strong knowledge of microcontrollers (STM32, ARM Cortex\\-M, or equivalents) and real\\-time systems (RTOS, bare\\-metal).
* Proficiency in C/C\\+\\+ and development tools (IDE, Git, ARM toolchain).
* Experience with industrial communication protocols (UART, SPI, I2C, CAN, LIN).
* Ability to integrate software with power hardware (resistive loads, BLDC motors, magnetron).
* Familiarity with debugging tools (oscilloscope, JTAG, protocol analyzer).
* Knowledge of electrical safety and electromagnetic compatibility regulations.
* System engineering experience: analysis, troubleshooting, performance optimization, and security management.


**Soft Skills**
* Strong problem\\-solving and analytical thinking.
* Ability to work in multidisciplinary teams and transfer know\\-how.
* Quality, safety, and innovation\\-oriented mindset.
* Effective communication and technical documentation skills.


**Plus**
* Experience in digitalization, IoT, or cloud integration projects.
* Participation in R\\&D or product innovation activities.
* Relevant technical certifications.


**Note:** 
 The SME role can also be filled by a system engineer with a strong background in oven technology (Preferred) , provided they have direct experience in embedded software development.
   

  

 Capgemini is a global business and technology transformation partner, helping organizations accelerate their dual transformation to address the evolving needs of customers and citizens. With a strong 55\\-year heritage and deep industry expertise, Capgemini is trusted by its clients to address the entire breadth of their business needs‚Äîfrom strategy and design to operations.
   

  

 To achieve this, Capgemini draws on the capabilities of its 360,000 team members in more than 50 countries, all driven by the purpose of unleashing human energy through technology for an inclusive and sustainable future. It is a responsible and diverse organization with market\\-leading capabilities in digital, cloud, and data.

title: Software Development Engineer-I
description:
We are seeking talented
 **SDE\\-I Backend Engineers** 
 to build scalable backend systems using Python, FastAPI, MongoDB, Redis, and Kafka. Work onsite to design robust APIs, microservices, and AI\\-integrated features solving real customer pain points for US enterprise clients.
   

  

 Key Responsibilities
   

  

* Design/develop scalable backend systems using Python \\+ FastAPI
* Build efficient APIs and microservices for frontend integrations
* Implement data models and database schemas (MongoDB/Redis)
* Integrate Kafka for event streaming and real\\-time processing
* Collaborate with product managers and frontend teams on requirements
* Maintain CI/CD pipelines for reliable deployments
* Troubleshoot complex issues ensuring system reliability and security
* Write clean, well\\-documented code following best practices


**Required Technical Skills**
**Backend Core:** 
 Python 3\\.11\\+, FastAPI, REST APIs, Microservices
   

  

**Databases:** 
 MongoDB, Redis, data modeling, schema design
   

  

**Messaging:** 
 Kafka, event\\-driven architecture
   

  

**DevOps:** 
 CI/CD pipelines, Docker, Git
   

  

**Applied AI:** 
 Basic ML integration, API optimization
   

  

 Skills: cd,microservices,ci,redis,python,mongodb,fastapi,kafka

title: Embedded Development Lead
description:
At Capgemini Engineering, the world leader in engineering services, we bring together a global team of engineers, scientists, and architects to help the world‚Äôs most‚ÄØinnovative companies unleash their potential. From autonomous cars to life\\-saving robots, our digital and software technology experts think outside the box as they‚ÄØprovide unique R\\&D and engineering services across all industries. Join us for a career full of opportunities. Where you can make a difference. Where no two days are‚ÄØthe same.
   

  

**Job Description**
**Embedded Development Lead**
**Location:** 
 Bangalore
   

  

**Experience:** 
 5‚Äì15 years
   

  

 Choosing Capgemini means choosing a place where you‚Äôll be empowered to shape your career, supported by a collaborative global community, and inspired to reimagine what‚Äôs possible. Join us in building innovative embedded solutions that power next\\-generation devices and experiences.
   

  

**Your Role**
 As an Embedded Software Engineer, you will be responsible for designing and implementing low\\-level embedded systems, BSP components, and application\\-level features. You‚Äôll work on cutting\\-edge technologies, ensuring robust performance and reliability across diverse platforms.
   

  

**In this role, you will:**
* Design and implement embedded software for bare\\-metal and RTOS\\-based systems.
* Develop and optimize BSP components including boot loaders and power management.
* Work on peripheral devices and interfaces such as USB, serial flash, I2C.
* Debug and root\\-cause complex issues to ensure high\\-quality deliverables.
* Collaborate on Bluetooth\\-based products and audio technology solutions.
* Contribute to projects using FreeRTOS, Zephyr, and similar platforms.


**Your Profile**
* Extensive hands\\-on experience with embedded software design and implementation.
* Strong proficiency in Embedded C programming and data structures.
* Experience with bare\\-metal and low\\-level embedded systems programming.
* Proven debugging and problem\\-solving skills for complex customer issues.
* Familiarity with BSP development, boot loaders, and power management.
* Working knowledge of peripheral interfaces (USB, I2C, serial flash).
* Experience with Bluetooth\\-based products and audio technology is a plus.
* Exposure to FreeRTOS, Zephyr, or similar RTOS environments.
* Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Electronics, Computer Science, or related field.


**What You‚Äôll Love About Working Here**
 We value flexibility and support our employees with remote work options and adaptable schedules to maintain a healthy work\\-life balance.
   

  

 Our inclusive culture brings together diverse professionals committed to growth, innovation, and excellence.
   

  

 You‚Äôll have access to continuous learning opportunities and certifications in emerging technologies.
   

  

 Capgemini is a global business and technology transformation partner, helping organizations to accelerate their dual transition to a digital and sustainable world, while creating tangible impact for enterprises and society. It is a responsible and diverse group of 340,000 team members in more than 50 countries. With its strong over 55\\-year heritage, Capgemini is trusted by its clients to unlock the value of technology to address the entire breadth of their business needs. It delivers end\\-to\\-end services and solutions leveraging strengths from strategy and design to engineering, all fueled by its market leading capabilities in AI, generative AI, cloud and data, combined with its deep industry expertise and partner ecosystem.

title: Junior Web Developer
description:
**Job Description:** 
 Web Developer (Shopify \\& WordPress)
 



**Company Name:** 
 Vani Kabir Multiverse pvt. ltd.
 



**Location:** 
 Gurugram, Sec\\-43
 



**Experience:** 
 1\\+ Year
 



  





**Role Overview** 




  





 We are looking for a hands\\-on Web Developer with strong experience in Shopify and WordPress, who understands core web technologies and is comfortable working with custom code, not just themes or templates. The ideal candidate should be able to build, customize, and optimize websites with clean, scalable, and performance\\-driven code.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities** 




  





 \\- Develop and customize Shopify (Liquid, custom sections, snippets, theme customization)
 



 \\- Develop and customize WordPress (custom themes, plugins, hooks, filters)
 



 \\- Write clean, maintainable HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
 



 \\- Work with APIs (REST APIs, third\\-party integrations, webhooks)
 



 \\- Handle backend logic, data flow, and integrations where required
 



 \\- Optimize websites for performance, security, and scalability
 



 \\- Debug, troubleshoot, and improve existing codebases
 



 \\- Collaborate with designers, marketers, and product teams to implement features
 



 \\- Ensure responsive, cross\\-browser, and mobile\\-friendly development
 



  





**Required Skills** 




  





 \\- 1\\+ year of hands\\-on experience in Shopify \\& WordPress development
 



 \\- Strong command over HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript
 



 \\- Experience with Shopify Liquid
 



 \\- Good understanding of WordPress core, custom themes, and plugins
 



 \\- Knowledge of backend concepts: APIs, JSON, authentication, webhooks
 



 \\- Ability to write custom code (not dependent on page builders or pre\\-built templates)
 



 \\- Basic understanding of database concepts (MySQL preferred)
 



 \\- Familiarity with Git / version control is a plus
 



  





**Good to Have (Bonus Skills)** 




  





 \\- Experience with custom Shopify apps or WordPress plugin development
 



 \\- Knowledge of performance optimization \\& technical SEO
 



 \\- Experience integrating payment gateways, CRMs, or marketing tools
 



 \\- Basic understanding of server, hosting, and deployment workflows
 



  





**What We‚Äôre Looking For** 




  





 \\- Strong problem\\-solving mindset
 



 \\- Code\\-first developer, not a template\\-only implementer
 



 \\- Willingness to learn and adapt to new technologies
 



 \\- Attention to detail and clean coding practices

title: Sr Technical Lead-App Engg Services
description:
Area(s) of responsibility
   

  

**Tittle: Winchill Lead Developer**
**Responsibilities**
* Configure, Customize \\& Build solutions aligned with business process and requirements.
* Develop applications using Windchill‚Äôs REST API,
* Deploy and debug code through build process and with accordance to best practices throughout the development lifecycle.
* Work closely with onshore/offshore Business/Solution Architects and support them in developing prototypes and implementing full solutions.
* Understand the technical requirements and develop detailed design documents
* Coordinate support activities and identify solutions for complex issues
* Develop code with minimum supervision, that meets quality standards and best practices
* Provide unit and functional test\\-cases for the implemented solutions
* Selecting and deploying appropriate CI/CD tools
* Strive for continuous improvement and build continuous integration, continuous development, and constant deployment pipeline (CI/CD Pipeline)


**Knowledge/Skills, Education, And Experience**
* 6\\-9 years of experience with Windchill development
* Worked on Med Devices domain
* Should be well versed with DevOps approach and methodologies.
* Strong knowledge in Java/J2EE, SQL and scripting
* Strong Windchill Server side \\& Client\\-Side customization using Windchill API's is required and must.
* Strong Windchill Database Architecture is required.
* Strong Windchill High End Configuration like Lifecycle \\& Workflow customization and configuration to meeting business process requirement.
* Should have exposure working with Agile/Scrum Delivery model.
* Experience of REST services using ODATA/Swagger is preferred.
* Experience working on QMS/ Regulatory, MPMLink, Partslink modules.

title: Sr Technical Lead-App Development
description:
Area(s) of responsibility
   

  

* We are looking for a Generative AI Tech Lead and Developers to provide technical leadership and architectural direction for building and operating production\\-grade GenAI solutions on AWS. This role combines hands\\-on development, solution architecture, team mentorship, and operational ownership.
* Team will own end\\-to\\-end delivery of GenAI platforms using Python, AWS Bedrock (Agent Core SDK), AWS Strands SDK, and modern DevOps and observability practices, ensuring scalability, security, reliability, and cost efficiency.
* Solid understanding of LLMs(Anthropic (Claude LLM)), embeddings, prompts, tokens, latency, cost factors
* Practical experience with RAG architectures, vector stores, and grounding strategies
* Ability to select and justify model choices (open\\-source vs proprietary)
* Experience supporting real\\-world use cases, not just POCs or demos
* Experience in AWS bedrock platform using Python, Strands SDK Multi\\-Agents, LangGraph/CrewAI

title: Team Leader / Sr. Engineer - System Design
description:
**Management \\& Competency**
* Manage his team of engineers and technicians (yearly reviews, meetings, missions, objectives)
* Define the necessary qualifications and training plan for his team with the support of his management
* Allocate his team staff in the projects activities
* Propose trainings and career evolutions with the support of his management
* Contribute to the recruitment of the members of his department


**Budget**
* Propose and follow the budget for his team
* Responsible of the Team Efficiency Plan and achievements


**Process, Methodology, Tools, Equipment**
* Deploy the Engineering process, methodology and tools defined by / together with the Engineering discipline Manager / Director
* Participate to the definition of processes, methods and the tools necessary to properly handle projects
* Ensure the full deployment of 5 axes methodology
* Participate to the improvement of the standards, methods \\& tools of his Engineering discipline


**Standardization \\& Robust Design**
* Support RAISE team by ensuring knowledge, training and implementation of the standards
* Review and challenge Destandardization requests before release
* Ensure that each single design is achieving the highest level of Robust design.
